医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利兹大学科学家的唾液替代品可显着缓解口干症状研究人员将乳制品和素食配方中基于微凝胶的专利水性水凝胶润滑剂配方与各种市售唾液替代品（根据剪切力分为“液体”、“粘性液体”和“凝胶”）的体外润滑性能进行了比较流变学和拉伸性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Saliva-substitute-from-University-of-Leeds-scientists-offers-major-relief-for-dry-mouth-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Saliva-substitute-from-University-of-Leeds-scientists-offers-major-relief-for-dry-mouth-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfdc4e13-dc43-4c52-8382-cf631a2c1755 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 09:08:00 -0500 Saliva substitute from University of Leeds scientists offers major relief for dry mouth conditions
突破性人工智能工具 PANDA 在使用非造影 CT 早期检测胰腺癌方面展现出前景一种基于深度学习的方法，使用非对比计算机断层扫描 (CT) 扫描对胰腺病变进行高精度检测和分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Breakthrough-AI-tool-PANDA-shows-promise-in-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer-using-non-contrast-CT.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Breakthrough-AI-tool-PANDA-shows-promise-in-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer-using-non-contrast-CT.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18a7a1fb-6243-4f4b-9a5f-6fd8ffe546c9 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 09:05:00 -0500 Breakthrough AI tool PANDA shows promise in early detection of pancreatic cancer using non-contrast CT
佳能医疗数字放射成像集团推出智能降噪技术白皮书美国佳能医疗组件 (CMCU) - 数字放射成像 (DR) 是先进平板探测器 (FPD)、X 射线组件、X 射线管和创新成像软件的全球领导者，宣布发布题为《智能降噪》的白皮书：通过深度学习图像处理透视噪声，作者：Josh Johnson。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Canon-Medical-Digital-Radiography-Group-Introduces-Technical-White-Paper-on-Intelligent-Noise-Reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Canon-Medical-Digital-Radiography-Group-Introduces-Technical-White-Paper-on-Intelligent-Noise-Reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f159d06-d62b-4ab1-bcfe-b3edb9c3f0cb Thu, 23 Nov 2023 08:59:00 -0500 Canon Medical, Digital Radiography Group Introduces Technical White Paper on Intelligent Noise Reduction
新研究显示二价 COVID-19 加强剂可增强肺癌患者的抗体反应二价加强剂量增强了非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者中 Omicron XBB（亚）变体的中和作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-study-shows-bivalent-COVID-19-booster-increases-antibody-response-in-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-study-shows-bivalent-COVID-19-booster-increases-antibody-response-in-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=215e811d-8252-4473-a980-9840c4be6191 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 08:47:00 -0500 New study shows bivalent COVID-19 booster increases antibody response in lung cancer patients
研究揭示了噪音暴露、听力损失和体质之间的相互作用芬兰奥卢大学的新研究揭示了噪声暴露、听力损失和体质之间复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-sheds-light-on-the-interactions- Between-noise-exposure-hearing-loss-and-body-constitution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-sheds-light-on-the-interactions- Between-noise-exposure-hearing-loss-and-body-constitution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fb40430-c781-4300-8882-eeddd3a136ef Thu, 23 Nov 2023 08:30:47 -0500 Study sheds light on the interactions between noise exposure, hearing loss and body constitution
提出新指南以减少儿童屏气期间不必要的医疗干预屏气发作在幼儿中很常见，而且是良性的。然而，儿童在寻求医疗护理时经常接受不必要的诊断干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-guidelines-propose-to-reduce-unnecessary-medical-interventions-for-breath-holding-spells-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-guidelines-propose-to-reduce-unnecessary-medical-interventions-for-breath-holding-spells-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b549a189-a3a8-4859-bec1-7a3c5a84506f Thu, 23 Nov 2023 08:26:09 -0500 New guidelines proposed to reduce unnecessary medical interventions for breath-holding spells in children
研究揭示隔离措施如何影响 SARS-CoV-2 的进化轨迹研究人员利用之前报告的经验临床数据分析和多层次数学模型来预测 SARS-CoV-2 在感染和进化过程中动态的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Research-reveals-how-isolation-measures-influence-SARS-CoV-2s-evolutionary-trajectory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Research-reveals-how-isolation-measures-influence-SARS-CoV-2s-evolutionary-trajectory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b36650a-370f-4e50-b26e-6a4ccbc03514 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 08:23:00 -0500 Research reveals how isolation measures influence SARS-CoV-2's evolutionary trajectory
探索大豆异黄酮在前列腺癌治疗中的影响大豆异黄酮、金雀异黄酮、大豆黄酮和雌马酚的细胞机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Exploring-the-impact-of-soy-isoflavones-in-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Exploring-the-impact-of-soy-isoflavones-in-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e0c708-0fe0-4640-8449-181d4651cee1 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 08:12:00 -0500 Exploring the impact of soy isoflavones in prostate cancer therapy
彻底改变疼痛管理：研究强调低剂量局部麻醉药的有效性低剂量局麻药 (LA) 在各种临床情况下的治疗效果，凸显了当前研究的空白，以供未来探索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Revolutionizing-pain-management-Study-highlights-effectness-of-low-dose-local-anesthetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Revolutionizing-pain-management-Study-highlights-effectness-of-low-dose-local-anesthetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9a32e05-96e1-4ee5-ab69-5e8b67cab850 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 07:49:00 -0500 Revolutionizing pain management: Study highlights effectiveness of low-dose local anesthetics
裸蛤——明天的更可持续食物来源的答案？研究人员评估了特雷迪尼德类药物作为一种潜在的营养丰富且可持续的未来食物来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Naked-clams-e28093-tomorrows-answer-for-a-more-sustainable-food-source.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Naked-clams-e28093-tomorrows-answer-for-a-more-sustainable-food-source.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b941de-636a-42f5-a9f6-d789fd2b64dc Thu, 23 Nov 2023 07:19:00 -0500 Naked clams – tomorrow's answer for a more sustainable food source?
